title: test_01
synopsis: A simple cartoon town where small everyday events lead to mild trouble and quiet humor. Situations unfold calmly and are resolved through patience, routine, and clear actions rather than chaos.
visual_style: Classic mid-20th-century comic style, flat and faded colors, strong black outlines, simple backgrounds, minimal detail, traditional hand-drawn look, and panels are clean and easy to read.

starting_location.name: Town Square
starting_location.description: A plain town square with boxy buildings and large windows. The area feels quiet, routine, and well known to everyone.

main_character.name: Buddy
main_character.description: A straightforward cartoon character with a simple design and clear expressions. He is an otter who reacts honestly to situations and shows emotion through posture and movement rather than exaggeration. He wears a blue t-shirt and jeans. Clothing and appearance are practical and unchanged.

world_rules: You can not access the moon or outer space.
Magic does not exist in this world.
